Description of column contents: Each row contains a different sample name that exactly matches a sample name in the relevant input detection matrix
Additional comments: The run sequence order is derived from the order in which samples are listed (e.g., row 2 is the first sample injected, row 3 the second, and so on)

Description of column contents: A user-defined sample grouping to identify samples within a group. Cells should contain a string that describes the sample type or other group metric (e.g., Blank, Sample, Control)
